html:
inhabitants of Jerusalem/men of Judah. Although the inhabitants of Judah are the immediate audience for the Song presented by Isaiah, the Song may be sung to all Israel throughout all generations.

I. Isaiah uses third-person pronouns to refer to the Lord in 5:2 (for example, "he dug up the soil"); in 5:3-6 the Lord is represented by the first-person pronoun, I.
